section.heading: Statute of limitations.
section.text: An action to enforce an obligation, duty, or right arising under this article must be commenced within 3 years after the cause of action accrues.

annoGroup.heading: Uniform Commercial Code Comment
annoGroup.annotation: This section conforms to the period of limitations set by Section 3-118(g) for actions for breach of warranty and to enforce other obligations, duties or rights arising under Article 3. Bracketing “cause of action” recognizes that some states use a different term, such as “claim for relief.”
